SmartSqlMap.Insert: insert into ACT_RU_EXECUTION (ID_, REV_, PROC_INST_ID_, BUSINESS_KEY_, PROC_DEF_ID_, ACT_ID_, IS_ACTIVE_, IS_CONCURRENT_, IS_SCOPE_,IS_EVENT_SCOPE_, IS_MI_ROOT_, PARENT_ID_, SUPER_EXEC_, ROOT_PROC_INST_ID_, SUSPENSION_STATE_, TENANT_ID_, NAME_, START_TIME_, START_USER_ID_, IS_COUNT_ENABLED_, EVT_SUBSCR_COUNT_, TASK_COUNT_, JOB_COUNT_, TIMER_JOB_COUNT_, SUSP_JOB_COUNT_, DEADLETTER_JOB_COUNT_, VAR_COUNT_, ID_LINK_COUNT_) values ( #{id}, 1, #{processInstanceId}, #{businessKey}, #{processDefinitionId}, #{activityId}, #{isActive}, #{isConcurrent}, #{isScope}, #{isEventScope}, #{isMultiInstanceRoot}, #{parentId}, #{superExecutionId}, #{rootProcessInstanceId}, #{suspensionState}, #{tenantId}, #{name}, #{startTime}, #{startUserId}, #{isCountEnabled}, #{eventSubscriptionCount}, #{taskCount}, #{jobCount}, #{timerJobCount}, #{suspendedJobCount}, #{deadLetterJobCount}, #{variableCount}, #{identityLinkCount} )

insert into ACT_RU_EXECUTION (ID_, REV_, PROC_INST_ID_, BUSINESS_KEY_, PROC_DEF_ID_, ACT_ID_, IS_ACTIVE_, IS_CONCURRENT_, IS_SCOPE_,IS_EVENT_SCOPE_, IS_MI_ROOT_, PARENT_ID_, SUPER_EXEC_, ROOT_PROC_INST_ID_, SUSPENSION_STATE_, TENANT_ID_, NAME_, START_TIME_, START_USER_ID_, IS_COUNT_ENABLED_, EVT_SUBSCR_COUNT_, TASK_COUNT_, JOB_COUNT_, TIMER_JOB_COUNT_, SUSP_JOB_COUNT_, DEADLETTER_JOB_COUNT_, VAR_COUNT_, ID_LINK_COUNT_) values
(#{id}, 1, #{processInstanceId}, #{businessKey}, #{processDefinitionId}, #{activityId}, #{isActive}, #{isConcurrent}, #{isScope}, #{isEventScope}, #{isMultiInstanceRoot}, #{parentId}, #{superExecutionId}, #{rootProcessInstanceId}, #{suspensionState}, #{tenantId}, #{name}, #{startTime}, #{startUserId}, #{isCountEnabled}, #{eventSubscriptionCount}, #{taskCount}, #{jobCount}, #{timerJobCount}, #{suspendedJobCount}, #{deadLetterJobCount}, #{variableCount}, #{identityLinkCount})
SmartSqlMap.Update: update ACT_RU_EXECUTION set REV_ = #{revisionNext}, BUSINESS_KEY_ = #{businessKey}, PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{processDefinitionId}, ACT_ID_ = #{activityId}, IS_ACTIVE_ = #{isActive}, IS_CONCURRENT_ = #{isConcurrent}, IS_SCOPE_ = #{isScope}, IS_EVENT_SCOPE_ = #{isEventScope}, IS_MI_ROOT_ = #{isMultiInstanceRoot}, PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId}, SUPER_EXEC_ = #{superExecutionId}, ROOT_PROC_INST_ID_ = #{rootProcessInstanceId}, SUSPENSION_STATE_ = #{suspensionState}, NAME_ = #{name}, IS_COUNT_ENABLED_ = #{isCountEnabled}, EVT_SUBSCR_COUNT_ = #{eventSubscriptionCount}, TASK_COUNT_ = #{taskCount}, JOB_COUNT_ = #{jobCount}, TIMER_JOB_COUNT_ = #{timerJobCount}, SUSP_JOB_COUNT_ = #{suspendedJobCount}, DEADLETTER_JOB_COUNT_ = #{deadLetterJobCount}, VAR_COUNT_ = #{variableCount}, ID_LINK_COUNT_ = #{identityLinkCount} where ID_ = #{id} and REV_ = #{revision}
update ACT_RU_EXECUTION set LOCK_TIME_ = null where ID_ = #{id}
SmartSqlMap.Delete: delete from ACT_RU_EXECUTION where ID_ = #{id} and REV_ = #{revision}

Switch.Case: inner join ACT_RU_VARIABLE A${index} on RES.ID_ = A${index}.EXECUTION_ID_
Switch.Default: inner join ACT_RU_VARIABLE A${index} on RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = A${index}.PROC_INST_ID_

IsNotNull.Test: orQueryObject.processDefinitionId != null or orQueryObject.processDefinitionKey != null or orQueryObject.processDefinitionVersion != null or orQueryObject.processDefinitionCategory != null or orQueryObject.processDefinitionName != null or (orQueryObject.processDefinitionIds != null and !orQueryObject.processDefinitionIds.isEmpty()) or (orQueryObject.processDefinitionKeys != null and !orQueryObject.processDefinitionKeys.isEmpty())

For.IsNotNull: inner join ACT_RE_PROCDEF P_OR${orIndex} on RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = P_OR${orIndex}.ID_
left outer join ACT_RU_VARIABLE A_OR${orIndex} on RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = A_OR${orIndex}.PROC_INST_ID_
left outer join ACT_RE_PROCDEF DEPLOY_P_OR${orIndex} ON RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = DEPLOY_P_OR${orIndex}.ID_

IsNotNull.For: inner join ACT_RU_EVENT_SUBSCR EVT${index} on RES.ID_ = EVT${index}.EXECUTION_ID_

IsNotEmpty.IsNotNull: inner join ACT_RU_EXECUTION INST on RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = INST.ID_

Statement.If: left outer join ACT_RU_TIMER_JOB JOB ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = JOB.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID_

Where.IsTrue: and ((RES.PARENT_ID_ is not null or RES.SUPER_EXEC_ is not null) and RES.IS_SCOPE_ = #{onlySubProcessExecutions})
Where.IsNotNull: and RES.SUPER_EXEC_ IN (select ID_ from ACT_RU_EXECUTION where PROC_INST_ID_ = #{superProcessInstanceId})
and RES.ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from ACT_RU_EXECUTION where ID_ = (select SUPER_EXEC_ from ACT_RU_EXECUTION where ID_ = #{subProcessInstanceId}))
and EXISTS(select ID_ from ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I where I.PROC_INST_ID_ = RES.ID_ and I.USER_ID_ = #{involvedUser})

IsNotNull.Property: queryVariableValue.textValue != null and queryVariableValue.longValue == null and queryVariableValue.doubleValue == null
queryVariableValue.textValue == null and queryVariableValue.textValue2 == null and queryVariableValue.longValue == null and queryVariableValue.doubleValue == null

Switch.Case: and (A${index}.TEXT_ is not null or A${index}.TEXT2_ is not null or A${index}.LONG_ is not null or A${index}.DOUBLE_ is not null or A${index}.BYTEARRAY_ID_ is not null)
Switch.Default: and A${index}.TEXT_ is null and A${index}.TEXT2_ is null and A${index}.LONG_ is null and A${index}.DOUBLE_ is null and A${index}.BYTEARRAY_ID_ is null

Where.If: and (JOB.EXCEPTION_MSG_ is not null or JOB.EXCEPTION_STACK_ID_ is not null)

SmartSqlMap.Statement: from ACT_RU_EXECUTION RES inner join ACT_RE_PROCDEF P on RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = P.ID_

from ACT_RU_EXECUTION RES inner join ACT_RE_PROCDEF P on RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = P.ID_
left outer join ACT_RU_VARIABLE VAR ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = VAR.EXECUTION_ID_ and VAR.TASK_ID_ is null
select E.*, S.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PARENT_PROC_INST_ID_ from ACT_RU_EXECUTION E LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION S ON E.SUPER_EXEC_ = S.ID_
SmartSqlMap.Select: where E.ROOT_PROC_INST_ID_ = (select ROOT_PROC_INST_ID_ from ACT_RU_EXECUTION where ID_ = #{parameter})
where E.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and E.PARENT_ID_ is not null
select ID_ from ACT_RU_EXECUTION where PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{processDefinitionId} and PARENT_ID_ is null
